title: Jaishankar 1st Minister In Nearly A Decade To Visit Pak. What's Expected
content: S Jaishankar today landed in Islamabad to attend a conclave of the SCO, in the first visit to Pakistan by an Indian minister in nearly a decade.
summary: S Jaishankar today landed in Islamabad to attend a conclave of the SCO, in the first visit to Pakistan by an Indian minister in nearly a decade.

title: US Teacher Groomed Teen Student Before Having Sex With Him, Alleges Lawsuit
content: On his eighth-grade graduation day, Solis took the boy into a classroom, locked the door, and coerced him into sex.

title: "The Solution Is A Ceasefire": Hezbollah Deputy Chief Warns Israel
content: Hezbollah deputy chief Naim Qassem warned Israelis on Tuesday that the only solution to the current war was a ceasefire that would pave the way for north Israel residents to return, vowing his group would not be defeated.
summary: Hezbollah deputy chief Naim Qassem warned Israelis on Tuesday that the only solution to the current war was a ceasefire that would pave the way for north Israel residents to return, vowing his group would not be defeated.

title: Most Victims Of Israeli Air Strike In Lebanon Were Women And Children: UN
content: The UN human rights office said on Tuesday it had received reports that most of the 22 victims of an Israeli air strike on a building in northern Lebanon were women and children.
summary: The UN human rights office said on Tuesday it had received reports that most of the 22 victims of an Israeli air strike on a building in northern Lebanon were women and children.

title: Kamala Harris Accused Of Plagiarism In Book About Being 'Smart On Crime'
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris is under scrutiny due to allegations of plagiarism in a book she co-authored in 2009.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris is under scrutiny due to allegations of plagiarism in a book she co-authored in 2009.

title: Maldives President Fires Over 225 Political Appointees To Cut Costs
content: The Maldives president has sacked more than 225 political appointees, including ministers, in a bid to reduce the cash-strapped Indian Ocean nation's expenditure, his office said on Tuesday.
summary: The Maldives president has sacked more than 225 political appointees, including ministers, in a bid to reduce the cash-strapped Indian Ocean nation's expenditure, his office said on Tuesday.

title: New York Times' "Cease And Desist" Notice To AI Startup Over Content Use
content: The New York Times has sent generative AI startup Perplexity a "cease and desist" notice demanding the company stop using its content, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday.
summary: The New York Times has sent generative AI startup Perplexity a "cease and desist" notice demanding the company stop using its content, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday.

title: "Kind Of Miracle": Russian Man Survives 2 Months Adrift At Sea
content: A Russian man was found alive after drifting for two months on an inflatable boat while another man and a teenage boy died, prosecutors said Tuesday.
summary: A Russian man was found alive after drifting for two months on an inflatable boat while another man and a teenage boy died, prosecutors said Tuesday.

title: Hoax Calls Ground 7 Flights, Air India Jet Lands At Remote Canada Airport
content: An Air India direct flight from New Delhi to Chicago was diverted toIqaluit Airport in Canada today following a hoax bomb threat which was posted online.
summary: An Air India direct flight from New Delhi to Chicago was diverted toIqaluit Airport in Canada today following a hoax bomb threat which was posted online.

title: 'We Listen To US But Decision Will Be Ours': Israel On Iran Retaliation
content: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's office said Tuesday that Israel -- and not the United States -- will decide how it will strike back after Iran fired around 200 missiles at his country earlier this month.
summary: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's office said Tuesday that Israel -- and not the United States -- will decide how it will strike back after Iran fired around 200 missiles at his country earlier this month.

title: Explained: AI Forecasts Floods, But Cannot Erase Risk Of Disaster
content: AI has supercharged weather forecasting, using a range of statistical tools to analyse years of historical data and predict patterns, and at a lower cost than traditional numerical weather predictions.
summary: AI has supercharged weather forecasting, using a range of statistical tools to analyse years of historical data and predict patterns, and at a lower cost than traditional numerical weather predictions.

title: US, Philippines Begin Joint Military Drills Amid Rising Tensions With China
content: The armed forces of the United States and Philippines began large-scale joint exercises with key allies on Tuesday that will take place in several areas in the Philippines, including those facing Taiwan and the South China Sea.
summary: The armed forces of the United States and Philippines began large-scale joint exercises with key allies on Tuesday that will take place in several areas in the Philippines, including those facing Taiwan and the South China Sea.

title: Swedish Prosecutor Confirms 'Rape' Probe Without Naming Kylian Mbappe
content: On Monday, Swedish newspapers Aftonbladet and Expressen reported that a rape investigation had been opened following Mbappe's two-day visit to the Nordic capital.
summary: On Monday, Swedish newspapers Aftonbladet and Expressen reported that a rape investigation had been opened following Mbappe's two-day visit to the Nordic capital.

title: One Killed, Another Wounded In South Israel Shooting: Hospital
content: "A short time ago, two injured people from the shooting incident on Route 4 were taken to the hospital. One patient died on his way to the hospital," the Assuta hospital said in a statement.

title: Next Full Moon Is "Hunter's Moon". Where And How To Watch It
content: The night sky is about to put on a spectacular show this week. The Hunter's Moon, the third of four consecutive supermoons in 2024, will rise on Thursday, October 17.

title: India-Canada Ties Hit New Low: Timeline Of How Relations Soured
content: The India-Canada relations nosedived after Justin Trudeau said last year that there was credible intelligence linking India's government to the killing of Khalistani terrorist Hardeep Singh Nijjar.
summary: The India-Canada relations nosedived after Justin Trudeau said last year that there was credible intelligence linking India's government to the killing of Khalistani terrorist Hardeep Singh Nijjar.

title: Nijjar Killing, Bishnoi Gang, Trade Talks: How India-Canada Relations Soured
content: India-Canada diplomatic ties soured further this week after allegations by Canadian federal police that "agents" of Delhi are working with organised criminals to "target (the) South Asian community... specifically pro-Khalistani elements" there.
summary: India-Canada diplomatic ties soured further this week after allegations by Canadian federal police that "agents" of Delhi are working with organised criminals to "target (the) South Asian community... specifically pro-Khalistani elements" there.

title: "Over $1000 Trillion": Elon Musk On Cost Of Building A City On Mars
content: "To build a city on Mars that can grow by itself likely requires at least a million tons of equipment, which would therefore require >$1000 trillion," Elon Musk, SpaceX CEO wrote on X (formerly Twitter).
summary: "To build a city on Mars that can grow by itself likely requires at least a million tons of equipment, which would therefore require >$1000 trillion," Elon Musk, SpaceX CEO wrote on X (formerly Twitter).
